정수

Quintessence

재귀창조 (Creation)

레벨: 조형가 4

표시: Material; see text

구현 시간: 1 round

거리: 0 ft.

지속시간: Instantaneous

내성 굴림: None

You collapse a bit of time from the continuum, forming a 1-ounce dollop of thick, gooey material called 정수. This substance shimmers like a silver mirror when viewed from some angles but is transparent from other viewpoints. You can smooth a dollop of 정수 around any extremely small object.

Objects sealed within 정수 are protected from the effects of time; in practical terms, they enter a state of stasis. Living flesh with only partial contact with 정수 is also partially pulled out of the time stream (the manifester is immune to this effect). This disruption deals 1 point of 피해 per round beginning 10 rounds after partial contact occurs.

정수 can be manually scraped away from a protected object, freeing it to rejoin the time stream. When you do this, there is a 75% chance that the 정수 evaporates back into the continuum. Otherwise, it coalesces again into a 1-inch-diameter bead, available for later use.

Large quantities of 정수 could theoretically be gathered to preserve large items or structures (or even a complete living creature; if completely immersed, a living creature would not take the 피해 associated with partial contact). However, psionic characters and creatures are generally loath to do so because accumulations of 정수 weighing 1 pound or more hinder psionic activity within a 5-foot radius of the accumulation: Powers require twice as many 파워 포인트 to manifest, unless the manifester makes a successful Will save each time he or she attempts to manifest a power. Also in these circumstances, manifesting a psi-like ability that is usable at will is a full-round action rather than a standard action.

This power does not let you pinpoint the location of an affected mind if you don’t have line of sight to the subject.

현실 수정

Reality Revision

초감각

레벨: 사이언/와일더 9

As 현실 왜곡, but with more farreaching effects. A 현실 수정 can produce any one of the following effects.

• Duplicate any other power (but not a spell) of 6th 레벨 or lower, such as a 사이킥 군인 power.

• Duplicate any 사이언 power of 7 레벨 or lower even if it’s a power prohibited to you.

• Undo the harmful effects of many other powers, such as 소우주, 기아스/임무, or 광기.

• Create a nonpsionic item of up to 25,000 gp in value.

• Create a psionic item, or add to the powers of an existing psionic item (see XP cost below).

• Grant a creature a +1 inherent bonus to an ability score. Two to five 현실 수정 manifested in immediate succession can grant a creature a +2 to +5 inherent bonus to an ability score. Inherent bonuses are instantaneous, so they cannot be negated or dispelled. An inherent bonus cannot exceed +5 for a single ability score. Inherent bonuses to a particular ability score do not stack; only the best one applies.

• Remove injuries and afflictions. A single 현실 수정 can 보조 one creature per 구현자 레벨, and all subjects are cured of the same kind of affliction.

현실 수정 can not restore the experience point loss from manifesting a power or casting a spell, or the 레벨 or  건강 loss from being returned to life by those effects that reduce 레벨 or 건강.

• Revive the 죽음. 현실 수정 can bring a 죽음 creature back to life by duplicating a 부활 spell. This power can revive a 죽음 creature whose body has been destroyed, but the task takes two manifestations of 현실 수정, one to recreate the body and another to infuse the body with life again. 현실 수정 cannot prevent a character who is brought back to life from losing a 레벨.

• 운송수단 travelers. This power can lift one creature per 구현자 레벨 from anywhere on any plane and place those creatures anywhere else on any plane regardless of local 상태이상. An unwilling target gets a Will save to negate the effect, and 파워 저항 (if any) applies.

• Undo misfortune. 현실 수정 can undo a single recent event. Manifesting the power forces a reroll of any roll made within the last round (including your last turn). Reality reshapes itself to accommodate the new result. The reroll, however, may be as bad as or worse than the original roll. An unwilling target gets a Will save to negate the effect, and 파워 저항 (if any) applies.

You can try to use 현실 수정 to produce more powerful effects than these, but doing so is dangerous. The manifestation may pervert your intent into a literal but undesirable fulfillment or only a partial fulfillment.

Duplicated powers allow 내성 굴림 and 파워 저항 as normal (but save DCs are calculated as though the power is 9th 레벨).

XP Cost: The minimum XP cost for manifesting 현실 수정 is 5,000

XP. When a manifestation duplicates a power that has an XP cost, you must pay 5,000 XP or that cost, whichever is more. When a manifestation creates or improves a psionic item, you must pay twice the normal XP cost for crafting or improving the item, plus an additional 5,000 XP.

복원, 사이오닉
